name: [PROJECT: DRIFT]
description:
This game offers you competitive tracks which enables you to experience unique drifting.
Open new career opportunities ,get new cars by completing missions.

4 carrier modes : Beginner , Amateur ,Expert ,Professional.
Once you improve your drift skills , new carrier modes will be opened.

Features :
- High quality graphics.
- Realistic car designs.
- Adjustable game cameras.
- Realistic car physics.
- 45 tracks.
- Carrier modes.
- Easy controlls.
- Special Drift mode.
- Minimalist Design.

This best drift game.
